editor.label: Application Server - IIS CreateWebSite
editor.description: This procedure creates a web site configuration on a local or remote computer.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step. i.e: iisweb or 'c:/windows/system32/iisweb.vbs'. (Required)

formElement.label: Absolute path attached to the web site:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute physical path assigned to the web site you want to create. (Required)

formElement.label: Host header name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host header name for the web site.

formElement.label: Web site name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the descriptive name, or the metabase path, of the web site you want to create. (Required)

formElement.label: Start web site:
formElement.documentation: Indicate if the web site must be started after creation.
